channel.title: Chaotics are glitchy?
channel.description: Hey guys, on my server there are chaotics, and they look really glitchy.. I stole this video off of Sagi X-evolution thread so I hope he doesn't mind.. but Chaotic Maul- http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=ifafc6&s=7 Rapier - http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2uh91nb&s=7 Does anyone know how to fix this where they have the correct animations?

item.title: Chaotics are glitchy?
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Hey guys, on my server there are chaotics, and they look really glitchy… I stole this video off of Sagi X-evolution thread so I hope he doesn’t mind… but Chaotic Maul- http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=ifafc6&s=7 Rapier - http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2uh91nb&s=7 Does anyone know how to fix this where they have the correct animations?
